flawed_nl_solution:
His new deadlift is 300*2.5+100=<<300*2.5+100=580>>580 pounds
So he added 580-300=<<580-300=280>>280 pounds to his deadlift
This took 18-13=<<18-13=5>>5 years
So he added 280/5=<<280/5=56>>56 pounds per year
#### 56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 850, not 580. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
